title: Photoshop Elements 15 for Beginners
headline: Learn how to master the use of Photoshop Elements 15 with this free online course.
description: This free online beginners' Photoshop course will teach you how to edit images using tools such as Auto Smart Tone, Effects, Textures and Frames and the Quick Selection Tool. You will study some of the new features added to it and learn how to access and navigate the help features. You will learn how to adjust its setting, customize preferences, and backup and restore files. You will also study keyboard shortcuts, and more!

courseDescription:
In this Photoshop Elements 15 for Beginners Course, you'll get a fantastic grounding in how Photoshop Elements works. The course begins by looking at how the Photoshop Elements Organizer works. You will then be introduced to the different ways of importing images into Photoshop Elements before moving onto editing photos and images.

 

From there the course looks at printing options in Photoshop Elements and also at some more intermediate techniques such as cropping, rotating, flipping and removing red eye. If you're looking for a simple, cost-effective way to edit your images then Photoshop Elements 15 could be the software for you. Learn to use it the right way in this detailed beginners course with video tutorials from software training experts SimonSezIT.

Start Course Now
certificateDetail:
All Alison courses are free to enrol study and complete. To successfully complete this certificate course and become an Alison Graduate, you need to achieve 80% or higher in each course assessment. Once you have completed this certificate course, you have the option to acquire an official Diploma, which is a great way to share your achievement with the world.

Your Alison certificate is:
  • Ideal for sharing with potential employers
  • Include it in your CV, professional social media profiles and job applications.
  • An indication of your commitment to continuously learn, upskill & achieve high results.
  • An incentive for you to continue empowering yourself through lifelong learning.
Alison offers 3 types of Diplomas for completed Diploma courses:
  • Digital certificate: a downloadable certificate in PDF format immediately available to you when you complete your purchase.
  • certificate: a physical version of your officially branded and security-marked certificate, posted to you with FREE shipping.
  • Framed certificate: a physical version of your officially branded and security marked certificate in a stylish frame, posted to you with FREE shipping.
Start Course Now

All certificate are available to purchase through the Alison Shop. For more information on purchasing Alison certificate, please visit our FAQs. If you decide not to purchase your Alison certificate, you can still demonstrate your achievement by sharing your Learner Record or Learner Achievement Verification, both of which are accessible from your Dashboard. For more details on our certificate pricing, please visit our Pricing Page

modules.name: Module
modules.description: In this module you will learn about Photoshop Elements 15 (PSE 15), and it covers topics such as Acquiring PSE 15, What's New in PSE 15, Starting PSE 15, PSE 15 Help, Preferences, Keyboard Shortcuts

modules.name: Module
modules.description: In this module you will learn about Quick start to PSE 15, and it covers topics such as Getting Images, Performing Fixes, and Presenting Images.
topics: Getting Images, Performing Fixes, and Presenting Images

modules.name: Module
modules.description: In this module you will learn about the Organizer, and it covers topics such as The Organizer Workspace, Catalogs, The Media Browser and Adaptive Grid, The Timeline, Full Screen View, Instant Fix, Image Properties, Keywords and Tags, and Albums.
topics: The Media Browser and Adaptive Grid

modules.name: Module
modules.description: In this module you will learn about acquiring content, and it covers topics such as Importing from a Camera, Importing from Files and Folders, Importing from a Scanner, and Bulk Import.

modules.name: Module
modules.description: In this module you will learn about backup and restore in PSE 15, and it covers topics such as Full and Incremental Backups, and Restoring Deleted Files.

modules.name: Module
modules.description: In this module you will learn about the Editor in PSE 15, and it covers topics such as the Editor Workspace, Editor Preferences, Opening, Saving and Closing Images,Image Size and Resolution, and Zoom and Pan.

modules.name: Module
modules.description: In this module you will learn about editing in Quick Mode, and it covers topics such as Quick Mode Adjustments, Effects, Textures and Frames, Auto Smart Tone, Quick Selection Tool, and Red Eye Removal.
topics: Editing in Quick Mode - Learning Outcomes
Editing in Quick Mode - Lesson Summary

modules.name: Module
modules.description: In this module you will learn about printing options in PSE 15, and it covers topics such as Printing Images and Print Settings, and Printing Contact Sheets.

modules.name: Module
modules.description: In this module you will learn about editing in Expert Mode, and it covers topics such as Expert Mode Tools and Options, Cropping, Rotating and Flipping, Undo, Redo, Revert and History Panel, and Straightening Images.
topics: Editing in Expert Mode - Learning Outcomes
Undo, Redo, Revert and History Panel
Editing in Expert Mode - Lesson Summary

modules.name: Module
modules.description: In this module you will learn about guided editing in PSE 15, and it covers topics such as Photo Text Guided Edit, Speed Pan Guided Edit, and Painterly Guided Edit.

modules.name: Module
topics: Photoshop Elements 15 for Beginners - Course Assessment
